description:
By becoming a Tier Supporter or Server Booster, you are directly contributing to help keep the community alive and flourishing.
We really can't thank you enough :heart:

**[CLICK HERE TO BECOME A TIER SUPPORTER](https://upgrade.chat/vertyco)**

footer.text: Thank you for playing on Vertyco!

fields.name: Server Booster
fields.value:

`Role:   `@Server Booster <:energy:871919674424696833>
`Payday: `200 VC
`Perks:  `Access the VIP section and basic role color panel
